title: UK professor dies suddenly over the weekend in home accident
body: LEXINGTON, Ky. (WKYT) - Students and staff are mourning the loss of a professor who died suddenly.The  Dr. Susan Odom died over the weekend in a home accident.The student paper says she fell on the stairs of her home. A co-worker later found her.Odom was a chemistry professor.She started working at UK in 2011. She was also a UK grad.
